creator: GameBook Oy
descriptionHtml:
Golf GameBook is the best golf app among all golf apps! Features include GPS Rangefinder, golf scorecard, live scoring, golf leaderboard, golf statistics, and many more, which make Golf GameBook the best Golf App available for free.
 
** Download for free - Want more? Subscribe and become a Gold Member
** Over 100 Countries - Golf Course database has you covered from Stockholm to Brisbane
** GPS and Range Finder - Measure and plan your next shots
** Digital Scorecard - Quickest way to record your scores and keep your golf stats
** Social and community features - Share your best golf moments
** Stats in your pocket - You’ll have all of your golf stats in one place nicely visualized
** Create tournaments - For free with pro-style real-time live scoring.
 
The Golf GameBook app is free to download and free to use. For those looking for those extra stats, private game features etc. you can become a Gold Member by subscribing.
 
** This is what you get for Free **
 
DIGITAL SCORECARD
- Record of your scores with ease
- Add putts and your tee shots to collect data of your game
 
GPS & RANGEFINDER
- Find or discover the nearest golf courses to you.
- GPS rangefinder to see the course map and get the distances at any times
- Use GPS to measure your shots.
 
LIVE SCORING AND LEADERBOARDS
- Live leaderboards for primary and side games.
- 25 different game formats including six match play formats such as Team Match Play Reds vs. Blues (like Ryder Cup), with both gross and net scores.
- Give live access to your games’ leaderboards to your golfing community.
 
GOLF STATISTICS AT YOUR FINGERTIPS
- Golf stats are automatically stored to your profile
- See your game improvement over time (last 10 games or by year)
- How well you hit the fairways whether it’s been left, right or center.
- Number of pars or eagles, putts and so one, it’s all stored in the stats.
 
TOURNAMENTS
- Create your own tournaments for free with pro-style real-time live scoring.
- Online Game Manager to create events and tournaments.
- Live scoring and leaderboards for multi-round games, tournaments and events
 
** Gold Membership Features **
 
PRIVATE GAME
- Set your games to stealth mode and worry no more, we keep it between us.
 
IMPROVED STATS
- Now you will see even more details about your game with bunker shots, chip shots, up and down, and bunker saves.
 
SAND SHOT; CHIP SHOTS & PENALTIES
- To feed your stats you will have the option to enter your total sand shots, chip shots as well as penalties for any given hole.
 
JUST GOLF, NO ADS
- Our advertising partners enable the free version of Golf GameBook, Gold memberships are equipped with the capability of controlling what advertisements you’re exposed to.
 
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
 
FIND US
 
Social
www.facebook.com/golfgamebook
www.instagram.com/golfgamebook
www.twitter.com/golfgamebook
www.youtube.com/golfgamebook
 
Support
Having issues with the app? Missing a course or you have any ideas or suggestions, feel free to drop us a line or two.
support@golfgamebook.com
 
Gold Membership & Payment Information
Golf GameBook offers Gold Membership subscriptions. Subscription and payment are delivered through Google Play store Account and are automatically renewed. At any given time you can manage your subscription from your app settings, in case you cancel your subscription, your current active subscription will continue until expired and not being renewed after.
 
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
descriptionShort: Top Golf App with GPS Rangefinder and Golf Scorecard

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New amazing features for Gold members!

- Where did I miss the green? Right, left, short or long - mark it down to improve your approaches!
- Length of the first putt: Do you want to make more birdies? Keep the statistics of the length of the first putt, improve your approaches and putting and make more birdies.
- New challenge type: Eclectic Scorecard challenge
- Some improvements and fixed bugs here and there

title: Golf GameBook - Best Golf App

creator: GameBook Oy
descriptionHtml:
Golf GameBook is the best golf app among all golf apps! Features include GPS Rangefinder, golf scorecard, live scoring, golf leaderboard, golf statistics, and many more, which make Golf GameBook the best Golf App available for free.
 
** Download for free - Want more? Subscribe and become a Gold Member
** Over 100 Countries - Golf Course database has you covered from Stockholm to Brisbane
** GPS and Range Finder - Measure and plan your next shots
** Digital Scorecard - Quickest way to record your scores and keep your golf stats
** Social and community features - Share your best golf moments
** Stats in your pocket - You’ll have all of your golf stats in one place nicely visualized
** Create tournaments - For free with pro-style real-time live scoring.
 
The Golf GameBook app is free to download and free to use. For those looking for those extra stats, private game features etc. you can become a Gold Member by subscribing.
 
** This is what you get for Free **
 
DIGITAL SCORECARD
- Record of your scores with ease
- Add putts and your tee shots to collect data of your game
 
GPS & RANGEFINDER
- Find or discover the nearest golf courses to you.
- GPS rangefinder to see the course map and get the distances at any times
- Use GPS to measure your shots.
 
LIVE SCORING AND LEADERBOARDS
- Live leaderboards for primary and side games.
- 25 different game formats including six match play formats such as Team Match Play Reds vs. Blues (like Ryder Cup), with both gross and net scores.
- Give live access to your games’ leaderboards to your golfing community.
 
GOLF STATISTICS AT YOUR FINGERTIPS
- Golf stats are automatically stored to your profile
- See your game improvement over time (last 10 games or by year)
- How well you hit the fairways whether it’s been left, right or center.
- Number of pars or eagles, putts and so one, it’s all stored in the stats.
 
TOURNAMENTS
- Create your own tournaments for free with pro-style real-time live scoring.
- Online Game Manager to create events and tournaments.
- Live scoring and leaderboards for multi-round games, tournaments and events
 
** Gold Membership Features **
 
PRIVATE GAME
- Set your games to stealth mode and worry no more, we keep it between us.
 
IMPROVED STATS
- Now you will see even more details about your game with bunker shots, chip shots, up and down, and bunker saves.
 
SAND SHOT; CHIP SHOTS & PENALTIES
- To feed your stats you will have the option to enter your total sand shots, chip shots as well as penalties for any given hole.
 
JUST GOLF, NO ADS
- Our advertising partners enable the free version of Golf GameBook, Gold memberships are equipped with the capability of controlling what advertisements you’re exposed to.
 
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
 
FIND US
 
Social

www.instagram.com/golfgamebook
www.twitter.com/golfgamebook
www.youtube.com/golfgamebook
 
Support
Having issues with the app? Missing a course or you have any ideas or suggestions, feel free to drop us a line or two.
support@golfgamebook.com
 
Gold Membership & Payment Information
Golf GameBook offers Gold Membership subscriptions. Subscription and payment are delivered through Google Play store Account and are automatically renewed. At any given time you can manage your subscription from your app settings, in case you cancel your subscription, your current active subscription will continue until expired and not being renewed after.

title: Golf GameBook - Best Golf App

creator: GameBook Oy
descriptionHtml:
Join almost million other golfers using Golf GameBook to keep track of your scores and to improve your game. Collect statistics, analyze your game, arrange tournaments and follow your friends on course. With GPS maps you can plan & measure your shots.

Golf GameBook has over 38 000 courses from over 180 countries available in the application. You can keep track of your scores around the globe and save your golf memories in one place. Use course ratings and reviews to find the best golf courses to play.

Golf GameBook is free to download and free to use. For those looking for those extra stats, multi-group tournaments, private game features and more, you can subscribe to our Gold membership.

** FREE FEATURES **

DIGITAL SCORECARD
- Easy scorekeeping and all your rounds stored in one place.
- Add putts and fairway hits to collect data of your game.

COURSE MAPS, GPS & RANGEFINDER
- GPS rangefinder to see the course map and get the distances at all times.
- Use GPS to measure your shots.
- Find or discover the nearest golf courses to you.

LIVE LEADERBOARDS
- Live leaderboards for primary and side games.
- 25 different game formats including six match play formats such as Team Match Play Reds vs. Blues (like Ryder Cup), with both gross and net scores.
- Give live access to your games’ leaderboards to your golfing community.
- Up to one group tournaments.

STATS AT YOUR FINGERTIPS
- Stats are automatically stored to your profile.
- See your game improvement over time (last 10 games or by year).
- How well you hit the fairways whether it’s been left, right or center.
- Number of pars or eagles, putts and so on, it’s all stored in the stats.

CHALLENGES
- Challenge yourself and compete against others by participating in frequently changing Challenges.
- Global leaderboards for each Challenge – see how you match against other users!

** GOLD MEMBERSHIP FEATURES **

PRIVATE GAME
- Set your games to stealth mode and worry no more, we keep it between us.

MULTI-GROUP TOURNAMENTS
- Create your own tournaments with pro-style real-time live scoring.
- Online Game Manager to create events and tournaments.
- Live scoring and leaderboards for multi-round games, tournaments and events.

IMPROVED STATS
- Now you will see even more details about your game with bunker shots, chip shots, up and downs, bunker saves, first put distances & where you missed the greens.
- See your hole specific statistics on every hole on the courses you have played previously. Make notes for each hole to plan your shots and improve your scores.
- To insert your stats you will have the option to enter your total sand shots, chip shots as well as penalties for any given hole.

FRIENDS COMPARISON
- Compare your statistics against your friends statistics and see who is the stats leader on the different areas of the game, such as fairway hits, putting & green hits.

JUST GOLF, NO ADS
- Our advertising partners enable the free version of Golf GameBook, Gold memberships are equipped with the capability of controlling what advertisements you’re exposed to.

GOLD MEMBERSHIP & PAYMENT INFORMATION
Golf GameBook offers three Gold Membership subscription options of varying durations (1 month, 6 months and 1 year) and prices. All options give you same full access to Gold Membership features. Subscription and payment are delivered through Google Play store Account and are automatically renewed. At any given time you can manage your subscription from your app settings, in case you cancel your subscription, your current active subscription will continue until expired and not being renewed after.

SUPPORT
Having issues with the app? Missing a course or you having ideas or suggestions, feel free to drop us a line or two.
support@golfgamebook.com

TERMS OF USE
https://online.golfgamebook.com/terms-of-use

PRIVACY POLICY
https://online.golfgamebook.com/privacy-policy

- Number of pars or eagles, putts and so on, it’s all stored in the stats.

CHALLENGES
- Challenge yourself and compete against others by participating in frequently changing Challenges.
- Global leaderboards for each Challenge – see how you match against other users!

** GOLD MEMBERSHIP FEATURES **

PRIVATE GAME
- Set your games to stealth mode and worry no more, we keep it between us.

MULTI-GROUP TOURNAMENTS
- Create your own tournaments with pro-style real-time live scoring.
- Online Game Manager to create events and tournaments.
- Live scoring and leaderboards for multi-round games, tournaments and events.

IMPROVED STATS
- Now you will see even more details about your game with bunker shots, chip shots, up and downs, bunker saves, first put distances & where you missed the greens.
- See your hole specific statistics on every hole on the courses you have played previously. Make notes for each hole to plan your shots and improve your scores.
- To insert your stats you will have the option to enter your total sand shots, chip shots as well as penalties for any given hole.

FRIENDS COMPARISON
- Compare your statistics against your friends statistics and see who is the stats leader on the different areas of the game, such as fairway hits, putting & green hits.

JUST GOLF, NO ADS
- Our advertising partners enable the free version of Golf GameBook, Gold memberships are equipped with the capability of controlling what advertisements you’re exposed to.

GOLD MEMBERSHIP & PAYMENT INFORMATION
Golf GameBook offers three Gold Membership subscription options of varying durations (1 month, 6 months and 1 year) and prices. All options give you same full access to Gold Membership features. Subscription and payment are delivered through Google Play store Account and are automatically renewed. At any given time you can manage your subscription from your app settings, in case you cancel your subscription, your current active subscription will continue until expired and not being renewed after.

SUPPORT
Having issues with the app? Missing a course or you having ideas or suggestions, feel free to drop us a line or two.
support@golfgamebook.com

TERMS OF USE
https://online.golfgamebook.com/terms-of-use

https://online.golfgamebook.com/privacy-policy

title: Golf GameBook - Scorecard & GPS Rangefinder ⛳️

creator: GameBook Oy
descriptionHtml:
Join almost million other golfers using Golf GameBook to keep track of your scores and to improve your game. Collect statistics, analyze your game, arrange tournaments and follow your friends on course. With GPS maps you can plan & measure your shots.

Golf GameBook has over 38 000 courses from over 180 countries available in the application. You can keep track of your scores around the globe and save your golf memories in one place. Use course ratings and reviews to find the best golf courses to play.

Golf GameBook is free to download and free to use. For those looking for those extra stats, multi-group tournaments, private game features and more, you can subscribe to our Gold membership.

** FREE FEATURES **

DIGITAL SCORECARD
- Easy scorekeeping and all your rounds stored in one place.
- Add putts and fairway hits to collect data of your game.

COURSE MAPS, GPS & RANGEFINDER
- GPS rangefinder to see the course map and get the distances at all times.
- Use GPS to measure your shots.
- Find or discover the nearest golf courses to you.

LIVE LEADERBOARDS
- Live leaderboards for primary and side games.
- 25 different game formats including six match play formats such as Team Match Play Reds vs. Blues (like Ryder Cup), with both gross and net scores.
- Give live access to your games’ leaderboards to your golfing community.
- Up to one group tournaments.

STATS AT YOUR FINGERTIPS
- Stats are automatically stored to your profile.
- See your game improvement over time (last 10 games or by year).
- How well you hit the fairways whether it’s been left, right or center.
- Number of pars or eagles, putts and so on, it’s all stored in the stats.

CHALLENGES
- Challenge yourself and compete against others by participating in frequently changing Challenges.
- Global leaderboards for each Challenge – see how you match against other users!

** GOLD MEMBERSHIP FEATURES **

PRIVATE GAME
- Set your games to stealth mode and worry no more, we keep it between us.

MULTI-GROUP TOURNAMENTS
- Create your own tournaments with pro-style real-time live scoring.
- Online Game Manager to create events and tournaments.
- Live scoring and leaderboards for multi-round games, tournaments and events.

IMPROVED STATS
- Now you will see even more details about your game with bunker shots, chip shots, up and downs, bunker saves, first put distances & where you missed the greens.
- See your hole specific statistics on every hole on the courses you have played previously. Make notes for each hole to plan your shots and improve your scores.
- To insert your stats you will have the option to enter your total sand shots, chip shots as well as penalties for any given hole.

FRIENDS COMPARISON
- Compare your statistics against your friends statistics and see who is the stats leader on the different areas of the game, such as fairway hits, putting & green hits.

JUST GOLF, NO ADS
- Our advertising partners enable the free version of Golf GameBook, Gold memberships are equipped with the capability of controlling what advertisements you’re exposed to.

GOLD MEMBERSHIP & PAYMENT INFORMATION
Golf GameBook offers three Gold Membership subscription options of varying durations (1 month, 6 months and 1 year) and prices. All options give you same full access to Gold Membership features. Subscription and payment are delivered through Google Play store Account and are automatically renewed. At any given time you can manage your subscription from your app settings, in case you cancel your subscription, your current active subscription will continue until expired and not being renewed after.

SUPPORT
Having issues with the app? Missing a course or you having ideas or suggestions, feel free to drop us a line or two.
support@golfgamebook.com

TERMS OF USE
https://online.golfgamebook.com/terms-of-use

PRIVACY POLICY
https://online.golfgamebook.com/privacy-policy

Join almost million other golfers using Golf GameBook to keep track of your scores and to improve your game. Collect statistics, analyze your game, arrange tournaments and follow your friends on course. With GPS maps you can plan & measure your shots.

Golf GameBook has over 38 000 courses from over 180 countries available in the application. You can keep track of your scores around the globe and save your golf memories in one place. Use course ratings and reviews to find the best golf courses to play.

Golf GameBook is free to download and free to use. For those looking for those extra stats, multi-group tournaments, private game features and more, you can subscribe to our Gold membership.

** FREE FEATURES **

DIGITAL SCORECARD
- Easy scorekeeping and all your rounds stored in one place.
- Add putts and fairway hits to collect data of your game.

COURSE MAPS, GPS & RANGEFINDER
- GPS rangefinder to see the course map and get the distances at all times.
- Use GPS to measure your shots.
- Find or discover the nearest golf courses to you.

LIVE LEADERBOARDS
- Live leaderboards for primary and side games.
- 25 different game formats including six match play formats such as Team Match Play Reds vs. Blues (like Ryder Cup), with both gross and net scores.
- Give live access to your games’ leaderboards to your golfing community.
- Up to one group tournaments.

STATS AT YOUR FINGERTIPS
- Stats are automatically stored to your profile.
- See your game improvement over time (last 10 games or by year).
- How well you hit the fairways whether it’s been left, right or center.
- Number of pars or eagles, putts and so on, it’s all stored in the stats.

CHALLENGES
- Challenge yourself and compete against others by participating in frequently changing Challenges.
- Global leaderboards for each Challenge – see how you match against other users!

** GOLD MEMBERSHIP FEATURES **

PRIVATE GAME
- Set your games to stealth mode and worry no more, we keep it between us.

MULTI-GROUP TOURNAMENTS
- Create your own tournaments with pro-style real-time live scoring.
- Online Game Manager to create events and tournaments.
- Live scoring and leaderboards for multi-round games, tournaments and events.

IMPROVED STATS
- Now you will see even more details about your game with bunker shots, chip shots, up and downs, bunker saves, first put distances & where you missed the greens.
- See your hole specific statistics on every hole on the courses you have played previously. Make notes for each hole to plan your shots and improve your scores.
- To insert your stats you will have the option to enter your total sand shots, chip shots as well as penalties for any given hole.

FRIENDS COMPARISON
- Compare your statistics against your friends statistics and see who is the stats leader on the different areas of the game, such as fairway hits, putting & green hits.

JUST GOLF, NO ADS
- Our advertising partners enable the free version of Golf GameBook, Gold memberships are equipped with the capability of controlling what advertisements you’re exposed to.

GOLD MEMBERSHIP & PAYMENT INFORMATION
Golf GameBook offers three Gold Membership subscription options of varying durations (1 month, 6 months and 1 year) and prices. All options give you same full access to Gold Membership features. Subscription and payment are delivered through Google Play store Account and are automatically renewed. At any given time you can manage your subscription from your app settings, in case you cancel your subscription, your current active subscription will continue until expired and not being renewed after.

SUPPORT
Having issues with the app? Missing a course or you having ideas or suggestions, feel free to drop us a line or two.
support@golfgamebook.com

TERMS OF USE
https://online.golfgamebook.com/terms-of-use

PRIVACY POLICY
https://online.golfgamebook.com/privacy-policy
descriptionShort: Easy to use scorecard, statistics and rangefinder to improve your game.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Improved game creation
- Creating games is now much easier and simpler. We have rebuilt the steps all the way from choosing the right golf course to starting your round.

Heavy lifting in the engine room
- During the past four months we have really focused on making the base of the app better. The app has been totally revamped and all the old and slow parts have been replaced with new ones. This will improve the speed and stability and gives a great base layer for upcoming new features.

rated.label: PEGI 3
rated.learnMoreHtmlLink:
Users interact, Shares location, In-app purchases
Learn more

- How well you hit the fairways whether it’s been left, right or center.
- Number of pars or eagles, putts and so on, it’s all stored in the stats.

CHALLENGES
- Challenge yourself and compete against others by participating in frequently changing Challenges.
- Global leaderboards for each Challenge – see how you match against other users!

** GOLD MEMBERSHIP FEATURES **

PRIVATE GAME
- Set your games to stealth mode and worry no more, we keep it between us.

MULTI-GROUP TOURNAMENTS
- Create your own tournaments with pro-style real-time live scoring.
- Live scoring and leaderboards for multi-round games, tournaments and events. (Currently unavailable)

IMPROVED STATS
- Now you will see even more details about your game with bunker shots, chip shots, up and downs, bunker saves, first put distances & where you missed the greens.
- See your hole specific statistics on every hole on the courses you have played previously. Make notes for each hole to plan your shots and improve your scores.
- To insert your stats you will have the option to enter your total sand shots, chip shots as well as penalties for any given hole.

FRIENDS COMPARISON
- Compare your statistics against your friends statistics and see who is the stats leader on the different areas of the game, such as fairway hits, putting & green hits.

JUST GOLF, NO ADS
- Our advertising partners enable the free version of Golf GameBook, Gold memberships are equipped with the capability of controlling what advertisements you’re exposed to.

GOLD MEMBERSHIP & PAYMENT INFORMATION
Golf GameBook offers three Gold Membership subscription options of varying durations (1 month, 6 months and 1 year) and prices. All options give you same full access to Gold Membership features. Subscription and payment are delivered through Google Play store Account and are automatically renewed. At any given time you can manage your subscription from your app settings, in case you cancel your subscription, your current active subscription will continue until expired and not being renewed after.

SUPPORT
Having issues with the app? Missing a course or you having ideas or suggestions, feel free to drop us a line or two.
support@golfgamebook.com

TERMS OF USE
https://online.golfgamebook.com/terms-of-use

title: Golf GameBook - Scorecard & GPS Rangefinder ⛳️

creator: GameBook Oy
descriptionHtml:
Join almost million other golfers using Golf GameBook to keep track of your scores and to improve your game. Collect statistics, analyze your game, arrange tournaments and follow your friends on course. With GPS maps you can plan & measure your shots.

Golf GameBook has over 38 000 courses from over 180 countries available in the application. You can keep track of your scores around the globe and save your golf memories in one place. Use course ratings and reviews to find the best golf courses to play.

Golf GameBook is free to download and free to use. For those looking for those extra stats, multi-group tournaments, private game features and more, you can subscribe to our Gold membership.

** FREE FEATURES **

DIGITAL SCORECARD
- Easy scorekeeping and all your rounds stored in one place.
- Add putts and fairway hits to collect data of your game.

COURSE MAPS, GPS & RANGEFINDER
- GPS rangefinder to see the course map and get the distances at all times.
- Use GPS to measure your shots.
- Find or discover the nearest golf courses to you.

LIVE LEADERBOARDS
- Live leaderboards for primary and side games.
- 25 different game formats including six match play formats such as Team Match Play Reds vs. Blues (like Ryder Cup), with both gross and net scores.
- Give live access to your games’ leaderboards to your golfing community.
- Up to one group tournaments.

STATS AT YOUR FINGERTIPS
- Stats are automatically stored to your profile.
- See your game improvement over time (last 10 games or by year).
- How well you hit the fairways whether it’s been left, right or center.
- Number of pars or eagles, putts and so on, it’s all stored in the stats.

CHALLENGES
- Challenge yourself and compete against others by participating in frequently changing Challenges.
- Global leaderboards for each Challenge – see how you match against other users!

** GOLD MEMBERSHIP FEATURES **

PRIVATE GAME
- Set your games to stealth mode and worry no more, we keep it between us.

MULTI-GROUP TOURNAMENTS
- Create your own tournaments with pro-style real-time live scoring.
- Live scoring and leaderboards for multi-round games, tournaments and events. (Currently unavailable)

IMPROVED STATS
- Now you will see even more details about your game with bunker shots, chip shots, up and downs, bunker saves, first put distances & where you missed the greens.
- See your hole specific statistics on every hole on the courses you have played previously. Make notes for each hole to plan your shots and improve your scores.
- To insert your stats you will have the option to enter your total sand shots, chip shots as well as penalties for any given hole.

FRIENDS COMPARISON
- Compare your statistics against your friends statistics and see who is the stats leader on the different areas of the game, such as fairway hits, putting & green hits.

JUST GOLF, NO ADS
- Our advertising partners enable the free version of Golf GameBook, Gold memberships are equipped with the capability of controlling what advertisements you’re exposed to.

GOLD MEMBERSHIP & PAYMENT INFORMATION
Golf GameBook offers three Gold Membership subscription options of varying durations (1 month, 6 months and 1 year) and prices. All options give you same full access to Gold Membership features. Subscription and payment are delivered through Google Play store Account and are automatically renewed. At any given time you can manage your subscription from your app settings, in case you cancel your subscription, your current active subscription will continue until expired and not being renewed after.

SUPPORT
Having issues with the app? Missing a course or you having ideas or suggestions, feel free to drop us a line or two.
support@golfgamebook.com

TERMS OF USE
https://online.golfgamebook.com/terms-of-use

PRIVACY POLICY
https://online.golfgamebook.com/privacy-policy
descriptionShort: Easy to use scorecard, statistics and rangefinder to improve your game.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
NEW FEATURES: Introducing Contests and Friends on course
-You can now add contests to your games. Closest to pin, Longest drive & Straightest drive. Follow live from the leaderboards!
-We also added a new Friends on course element to your home screen that allows you to quickly see who’s currently playing and how well they are doing. Don’t forget to leave them a cheerful comment!
-Improved friends search and friend suggestions

title: Golf GameBook Scorecard & GPS

creator: GameBook Oy
descriptionHtml:
Golf GameBook is a free, social and easy to use digital scorecard app for every golfer.

Join a community of over a million other golfers to keep track of your scores live with the best golf app in the world. Use GPS maps to plan and measure your shots on over 42 000 courses in over 200 countries. Collect statistics, analyze and improve your game. Arrange competitions, choose from 25 game formats including team formats and enjoy the live leaderboards. Keep up with your friends with the best-in-class social features like social feeds, content sharing and global challenges.

All that and much more for FREE. For those looking for extra stats, multi-group tournaments, private game mode and more, you can subscribe to our Gold membership starting at only $25 per year.


** FREE FEATURES **

DIGITAL SCORECARD
- Correct playing handicap for every course according to WHS rules
- Create rounds for up to 4 players
- Easy scorekeeping and real-time leaderboards
- All your rounds stored in one place

COURSE MAPS, GPS & RANGEFINDER
- GPS rangefinder to see the course map and get accurate distances at all times
- Use GPS to measure your shots for each club
- Find or discover the nearest golf courses to you

VERSATILE GAME FORMATS
- 25 different game formats including skins, match play and a number of team games like scramble and better ball game modes
- Side game option allows competing both individually and in teams
- Fun contests like longest drive and closest to pin

STATS AT YOUR FINGERTIPS
- Stats are automatically stored in stats section
- See your game improvement over different time periods
- Hit it to the left, right or center off the tee? Stats will tell you
- GIR, number of pars, eagles, putts and so on
- HCP group comparisons

SOCIAL FEATURES
- Add friends and upload content to your feed for them to see
- Your photos, videos and posts stored in your profile
- Notifications and friends on course feature allow you to see how your friends are doing and comment their round

CHALLENGES
- Compete against other golfers by participating in frequently changing Challenges
- Global leaderboards for each Challenge – see how you match against other users
- Win amazing prizes from top brands

THE BEST SERVICE
- From golfers to golfers
- Quick replies and help
- Courses added and updated on daily basis
- New features added all the time


** GOLD MEMBERSHIP FEATURES **


NO ADS
- Golf GameBook Gold allows an ad free experience

PRIVATE GAME
- Make your rounds invisible to anyone

MULTI-GROUP TOURNAMENTS
-Make golf even more fun by creating your own tournaments and events with live scoring for 200+ players

ADVANCED STATS
- Track even more details about your game with penalties, bunker shots, chip shots, up and downs, bunker saves, first putt distances & where you missed the greens
- See your hole specific statistics on every hole on the courses you have played previously

FRIENDS COMPARISON
- Compare your statistics against your friends and see who is the leader in different categories such as fairway hits, putting & green hits

HOLE NOTES
- Want to avoid the left rough on this hole? Always pick too little club? Hole notes remind you so you won’t repeat the same mistakes

GOLD MEMBERSHIP & PAYMENT INFORMATION
Golf GameBook offers three Gold Membership subscription options of varying durations (1 month, 6 months and 1 year) and prices. All options give you the same full access to Gold Membership features. Subscription and payment are delivered through Google Play store Account and are automatically renewed. You can manage your subscription from your app settings whenever. In case you cancel your subscription, your current active subscription will continue until expired and won’t be renewed after.

SUPPORT
Suggestions, issues with the app or a missing course? Our support team is happy to help you at support@golfgamebook.com

TERMS OF USE
https://golfgamebook.com/terms-of-use/

PRIVACY POLICY
https://golfgamebook.com/privacy-policy/

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
BOOM! The fully renewed Golf GameBook app is here!

We have totally reinvented the way you navigate through the Golf GameBook application. You can now easily access all the tools you need both on and off the golf course. And yeah, we also made the app look a lot nicer!

You will also love the totally redesigned Statistics section. It gives you new ways to set goals, analyse and improve your game. In addition, comparing stats with your friends has never been this much fun!

DIGITAL SCORECARD
- Correct playing handicap for every course according to WHS rules
- Create rounds for up to 4 players
- Easy scorekeeping and real-time leaderboards
- All your rounds stored in one place

COURSE MAPS, GPS & RANGEFINDER
- GPS rangefinder to see the course map and get accurate distances at all times
- Use GPS to measure your shots for each club
- Find or discover the nearest golf courses to you

VERSATILE GAME FORMATS
- 25 different game formats including skins, match play and a number of team games like scramble and better ball game modes
- Side game option allows competing both individually and in teams
- Fun contests like longest drive and closest to pin

STATS AT YOUR FINGERTIPS
- Stats are automatically stored in stats section
- See your game improvement over different time periods
- Hit it to the left, right or center off the tee? Stats will tell you
- GIR, number of pars, eagles, putts and so on
- HCP group comparisons

SOCIAL FEATURES
- Add friends and upload content to your feed for them to see
- Your photos, videos and posts stored in your profile
- Notifications and friends on course feature allow you to see how your friends are doing and comment their round

CHALLENGES
- Compete against other golfers by participating in frequently changing Challenges
- Global leaderboards for each Challenge – see how you match against other users
- Win amazing prizes from top brands

THE BEST SERVICE
- From golfers to golfers
- Quick replies and help
- Courses added and updated on daily basis
- New features added all the time


** GOLD MEMBERSHIP FEATURES **


NO ADS
- Golf GameBook Gold allows an ad free experience

PRIVATE GAME
- Make your rounds invisible to anyone

MULTI-GROUP TOURNAMENTS
-Make golf even more fun by creating your own tournaments and events with live scoring for 200+ players

ADVANCED STATS
- Track even more details about your game with penalties, bunker shots, chip shots, up and downs, bunker saves, first putt distances & where you missed the greens
- See your hole specific statistics on every hole on the courses you have played previously

FRIENDS COMPARISON
- Compare your statistics against your friends and see who is the leader in different categories such as fairway hits, putting & green hits

HOLE NOTES
- Want to avoid the left rough on this hole? Always pick too little club? Hole notes remind you so you won’t repeat the same mistakes

GOLD MEMBERSHIP & PAYMENT INFORMATION
Golf GameBook offers three Gold Membership subscription options of varying durations (1 month, 6 months and 1 year) and prices. All options give you the same full access to Gold Membership features. Subscription and payment are delivered through Google Play store Account and are automatically renewed. You can manage your subscription from your app settings whenever. In case you cancel your subscription, your current active subscription will continue until expired and won’t be renewed after.

SUPPORT
Suggestions, issues with the app or a missing course? Our support team is happy to help you at support@golfgamebook.com

TERMS OF USE
https://golfgamebook.com/terms-of-use/

PRIVACY POLICY
https://golfgamebook.com/privacy-policy/

Join a community of over a million other golfers to keep track of your scores live with the best golf app in the world. Use GPS maps to plan and measure your shots on over 42 000 courses in over 200 countries. Collect statistics, analyze and improve your game. Arrange competitions, choose from 25 game formats including team formats and enjoy the live leaderboards. Keep up with your friends with the best-in-class social features like social feeds, content sharing and global challenges.

All that and much more for FREE. For those looking for extra stats, multi-group tournaments, private game mode and more, you can subscribe to our Gold membership starting at only $25 per year.


** FREE FEATURES **

DIGITAL SCORECARD
- Correct playing handicap for every course according to WHS rules
- Create rounds for up to 4 players
- Easy scorekeeping and real-time leaderboards
- All your rounds stored in one place

COURSE MAPS, GPS & RANGEFINDER
- GPS rangefinder to see the course map and get accurate distances at all times
- Use GPS to measure your shots for each club
- Find or discover the nearest golf courses to you

VERSATILE GAME FORMATS
- 25 different game formats including skins, match play and a number of team games like scramble and better ball game modes
- Side game option allows competing both individually and in teams
- Fun contests like longest drive and closest to pin

STATS AT YOUR FINGERTIPS
- Stats are automatically stored in stats section
- See your game improvement over different time periods
- Hit it to the left, right or center off the tee? Stats will tell you
- GIR, number of pars, eagles, putts and so on
- HCP group comparisons

SOCIAL FEATURES
- Add friends and upload content to your feed for them to see
- Your photos, videos and posts stored in your profile
- Notifications and friends on course feature allow you to see how your friends are doing and comment their round

CHALLENGES
- Compete against other golfers by participating in frequently changing Challenges
- Global leaderboards for each Challenge – see how you match against other users
- Win amazing prizes from top brands

THE BEST SERVICE
- From golfers to golfers
- Quick replies and help
- Courses added and updated on daily basis
- New features added all the time


** GOLD MEMBERSHIP FEATURES **


NO ADS
- Golf GameBook Gold allows an ad free experience

PRIVATE GAME
- Make your rounds invisible to anyone

MULTI-GROUP TOURNAMENTS
-Make golf even more fun by creating your own tournaments and events with live scoring for 200+ players

ADVANCED STATS
- Track even more details about your game with penalties, bunker shots, chip shots, up and downs, bunker saves, first putt distances & where you missed the greens
- See your hole specific statistics on every hole on the courses you have played previously

FRIENDS COMPARISON
- Compare your statistics against your friends and see who is the leader in different categories such as fairway hits, putting & green hits

HOLE NOTES
- Want to avoid the left rough on this hole? Always pick too little club? Hole notes remind you so you won’t repeat the same mistakes

GOLD MEMBERSHIP & PAYMENT INFORMATION
Golf GameBook offers three Gold Membership subscription options of varying durations (1 month, 6 months and 1 year) and prices. All options give you the same full access to Gold Membership features. Subscription and payment are delivered through Google Play store Account and are automatically renewed. You can manage your subscription from your app settings whenever. In case you cancel your subscription, your current active subscription will continue until expired and won’t be renewed after.

SUPPORT
Suggestions, issues with the app or a missing course? Our support team is happy to help you at support@golfgamebook.com

TERMS OF USE
https://golfgamebook.com/terms-of-use/

PRIVACY POLICY
https://golfgamebook.com/privacy-policy/
descriptionShort: Social & easy to use scorecard, statistics and rangefinder to improve your game.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: BOOM! The fully renewed Golf GameBook app is here! We have totally reinvented the way you navigate through the Golf GameBook application. You can now easily access all the tools you need both on and off the golf course. And yeah, we also made the app look a lot nicer! You will also love the totally redesigned Statistics section. It gives you new ways to set goals, analyse and improve your game. In addition, comparing stats with your friends has never been this much fun!

- Hit it to the left, right or center off the tee? Stats will tell you
- GIR, number of pars, eagles, putts and so on
- HCP group comparisons

SOCIAL FEATURES
- Add friends and upload content to your feed for them to see
- Your photos, videos and posts stored in your profile
- Notifications and friends on course feature allow you to see how your friends are doing and comment their round

CHALLENGES
- Compete against other golfers by participating in frequently changing Challenges
- Global leaderboards for each Challenge – see how you match against other users
- Win amazing prizes from top brands

THE BEST SERVICE
- From golfers to golfers
- Quick replies and help
- Courses added and updated on daily basis
- New features added all the time


** GOLD MEMBERSHIP FEATURES **


NO ADS
- Golf GameBook Gold allows an ad free experience

PRIVATE GAME
- Make your rounds invisible to anyone

MULTI-GROUP TOURNAMENTS
-Make golf even more fun by creating your own tournaments and events with live scoring for 200+ players

ADVANCED STATS
- Track even more details about your game with penalties, bunker shots, chip shots, up and downs, bunker saves, first putt distances & where you missed the greens
- See your hole specific statistics on every hole on the courses you have played previously

FRIENDS COMPARISON
- Compare your statistics against your friends and see who is the leader in different categories such as fairway hits, putting & green hits

HOLE NOTES
- Want to avoid the left rough on this hole? Always pick too little club? Hole notes remind you so you won’t repeat the same mistakes

GOLD MEMBERSHIP & PAYMENT INFORMATION
Golf GameBook offers three Gold Membership subscription options of varying durations (1 month, 6 months and 1 year) and prices. All options give you the same full access to Gold Membership features. Subscription and payment are delivered through Google Play store Account and are automatically renewed. You can manage your subscription from your app settings whenever. In case you cancel your subscription, your current active subscription will continue until expired and won’t be renewed after.

SUPPORT
Suggestions, issues with the app or a missing course? Our support team is happy to help you at support@golfgamebook.com

descriptionShort: Social, digital golf scorecard, statistics, rangefinder, 25 game formats & more!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: NEW FEATURE: SIMULATOR ROUNDS! Wanna use Golf GameBook when playing indoors in a golf simulator? Select Simulator Round from the Game Type settings when creating a game. These rounds are collected separate from your regular golf rounds and therefore won't affect your statistics or mess up your list of played courses. Enjoy all of our Game Formats and Multi group Leaderboards also when playing indoors! Why not challenge a friend from another country to play a match with you?

CHALLENGES

- Global leaderboards for each Challenge – see how you match up against others
- Win amazing prizes from top brands

NO ADS

PRIVATE GAME
- Make your rounds & scorecard invisible to anyone

MULTI-GROUP TOURNAMENTS
-Make golf even more fun by creating your own tournaments & events with live scorecard for multiple groups and players

VERSATILE GAME FORMATS
- 20 different game formats including skins, match play & a number of team games like scramble & better ball game formats
- Fun contests like longest drive & closest to pin

GOLD MEMBERSHIP & PAYMENT INFORMATION

title: Golf GameBook Scorecard & GPS

creator: GameBook Oy
descriptionHtml:
An absolute essential for every golfer, Golf GameBook is the easy-to-use, digital golf scorecard, handicap tracker & golf range finder app.

With Golf GameBook’s advanced golf score keeper, golf range finder, handicap tracker, golf GPS, and easy-to-use golf scorecard, you have everything you need to up your game.

Use golf GPS maps & golf range finder on over 45,000 courses in over 200 countries.

Connect with over a million golfers, share your rounds, golf score keeper, use the score tracker, golf range finder, live golf scorecard, & enjoy golf with your friends on & off the course. With the handicap tracker you can see your progress.

Build games with friends, arrange competitions & choose from 20 game formats, whilst using the golf score keeper & getting live golf scorecard updates to see who’s on top of the leaderboard.

— GOLD MEMBERSHIP FREE TRIAL —
Discover all the features & benefits for free for 14 days with no commitment & no credit card required.

DIGITAL GOLF SCORECARD
- Correct playing handicap for every course according to WHS rules
- Create rounds and use the golf score keeper to track who’s in the lead
- Easy golf scorecard & real-time leaderboards

COURSE MAPS, GOLF GPS & RANGEFINDER
- Golf range finder to see the course map & get accurate distances
- Use golf GPS to measure your shots for each club
- Accurate golf GPS

ADVANCED STATS
- Track even more details about your game with golf score keeper, golf scorecard, golf range finder, HCP group comparisons & eclectic golf scorecard - Collect advanced stats such as bunker shots, GIRs, chip shots, up & downs, first putt distances, fairway hits & where you missed the greens
- GPS accurate range finder, & hole-specific stats
- Handicap tracker

FRIENDS COMPARISON
- Use golf score keeper, compare your golf scorecard & statistics against your friends & see who is the leader in different categories such as fairway hits, putting & green hits

SOCIAL FEATURES
- Add friends & upload content to your feed
- Photos, videos, & posts stored in your profile
- Share your golf scorecard, golf score keeper and more with friends
- Friends on course notifications allow you to see how your friends are doing & comment their round

CHALLENGES
- Compete against other golfers by participating in Challenges
- Global leaderboards for each Challenge – see how you match up against others
- Win amazing prizes from top brands

NO ADS
- Get an ad-free experience

PRIVATE GAME
- Make your rounds, golf scorecard & golf score keeper hidden

MULTI-GROUP TOURNAMENTS
-Make golf even more fun by creating your own tournaments & events with live golf scorecard for multiple groups and players

VERSATILE GAME FORMATS
- 20 different game formats including skins, match play & a number of team games like scramble & better ball game formats
- Fun contests like longest drive & closest to pin

GOLD MEMBERSHIP & PAYMENT INFORMATION
Subscription & payment are delivered through Google Play store Account & are automatically renewed. You can manage your subscription from your app settings whenever. In case you cancel your subscription, your current active subscription will continue until expired & won’t be renewed after.

SUPPORT
Our support team is happy to help: support@golfgamebook.com

TERMS OF USE
https://golfgamebook.com/terms-of-use/

PRIVACY POLICY
https://golfgamebook.com/privacy-policy/

title:
Golf GameBook Scorecard & GPS
10.3.7

creator: GameBook Oy
descriptionHtml:
Golf GameBook is a free golf scorecard app with golf GPS rangefinder, score keeper and golf live leaderboards. Golf GameBook is your personal golf tracker & golf GPS, providing precise yardage on every golf shot. The golf scorecard app calculates your golf scores and golf stats, and has almost all golf courses in the world.

Our golf scorecard is more than a score keeper & range finder. It's a comprehensive golf stats helper, designed to improve your golf handicap. The golf tracker and golf scorecard are crafted to simplify your golf.

Golf GameBook golf tracker & rangefinder is compatible with over 45,000 golf courses. Whether playing at your local golf course or abroad, our golf GPS range finder and golf scorecard will be your trusted partners.

Over million golfers play their rounds with Golf GameBook. We offer the best golf live leaderboard app globally, offering 18 different game formats, including a convenient golf score tracker and distance finder for accurate yardage.

Arrange up to 4 round golf tournaments for up to 72 players with golf live leaderboards. Our golf scorecard makes setting up a golf tournament as easy as a tap-in putt!

For those seeking advanced golf stats, golf tournaments, and golf GPS range finder, try our Gold membership. Try all features for free for 30 days with no credit card required.

** FREE FEATURES **

GOLF SCORECARD & SCORE KEEPER
- Correct playing handicap for every golf course according to WHS rules
- Easy golf tracker for almost all golf courses in the world

GOLF LIVE LEADERBOARDS
- Real time leaderboards to your games
- Friends can follow your round & golf scores in real time

SOCIAL FEATURES
- Follow your friends games on the golf course and comment on their golf scores
- Store your photos, videos, and posts in your profile

** GOLD MEMBERSHIP FEATURES **

COURSE MAPS, GOLF GPS & RANGEFINDER
- Golf GPS range finder to see the course map and get accurate distances
- Use GPS rangefinder to measure the yardage for any of your golf shots

GOLF TOURNAMENTS
- Up to 4 round golf tournaments with multiple game formats & live leaderboards
- Invite up to 72 players to your golf tournament

FUN GAME FORMATS
- 25 different formats including skins, match play and team games
- Fun contests like longest drive and closest to pin

STATS TRACKER & GOLF SCORE TRACKER
- Track & analyze your golf stats
- Track fairway & green hits, penalties, up & downs, and more
- Handicap group comparisons & compare stats against friends

NO ADS
- Enjoy an ad-free experience

GOLD MEMBERSHIP & PAYMENT INFORMATION
Golf GameBook offers two Gold Membership subscription options of varying durations (1 month or 1 year) and prices. All options give you the same full access to Gold Membership features. Subscriptions are delivered through Google Play Store Account and are automatically renewed. Manage your subscription from app settings whenever. If you cancel your subscription, your active subscription will continue until expired and won’t be renewed after.

SUPPORT
Need help? Contact us at support@golfgamebook.com

TERMS OF USE
https://golfgamebook.com/terms-of-use/

PRIVACY POLICY
https://golfgamebook.com/privacy-policy/

title:
Golf GameBook Scorecard & GPS
11.0.1

creator: GameBook Oy
descriptionHtml:
An absolute essential for every golfer, Golf GameBook is the easy-to-use, digital golf scorecard, handicap tracker & golf range finder app.

With Golf GameBook’s advanced golf score keeper, golf range finder, handicap tracker, golf GPS, and easy-to-use golf scorecard, you have everything you need to up your game.

Use golf GPS maps & golf range finder on over 45,000 courses in over 200 countries.

Connect with over a million golfers, share your rounds, golf score keeper, use the score tracker, golf range finder, live golf scorecard, & enjoy golf with your friends on & off the course. With the handicap tracker you can see your progress.

Build games with friends, arrange competitions & choose from 20 game formats, whilst using the golf score keeper & getting live golf scorecard updates to see who’s on top of the leaderboard.

— GOLD MEMBERSHIP FREE TRIAL —
Discover all the features & benefits for free for 30 days with no commitment & no credit card required.

DIGITAL GOLF SCORECARD
- Correct playing handicap for every course according to WHS rules
- Create rounds and use the golf score keeper to track who’s in the lead
- Easy golf scorecard & real-time leaderboards

COURSE MAPS, GOLF GPS & RANGEFINDER
- Golf range finder to see the course map & get accurate distances
- Use golf GPS to measure your shots for each club
- Accurate golf GPS

ADVANCED STATS
- Track even more details about your game with golf score keeper, golf scorecard, golf range finder, HCP group comparisons & eclectic golf scorecard - Collect advanced stats such as bunker shots, GIRs, chip shots, up & downs, first putt distances, fairway hits & where you missed the greens
- GPS accurate range finder, & hole-specific stats
- Handicap tracker

FRIENDS COMPARISON
- Use golf score keeper, compare your golf scorecard & statistics against your friends & see who is the leader in different categories such as fairway hits, putting & green hits

SOCIAL FEATURES
- Add friends & upload content to your feed
- Photos, videos, & posts stored in your profile
- Share your golf scorecard, golf score keeper and more with friends
- Friends on course notifications allow you to see how your friends are doing & comment their round

CHALLENGES
- Compete against other golfers by participating in Challenges
- Global leaderboards for each Challenge – see how you match up against others
- Win amazing prizes from top brands

NO ADS
- Get an ad-free experience

PRIVATE GAME
- Make your rounds, golf scorecard & golf score keeper hidden

MULTI-GROUP TOURNAMENTS
-Make golf even more fun by creating your own tournaments & events with live golf scorecard for multiple groups and players

VERSATILE GAME FORMATS
- 20 different game formats including skins, match play & a number of team games like scramble & better ball game formats
- Fun contests like longest drive & closest to pin

GOLD MEMBERSHIP & PAYMENT INFORMATION
Subscription & payment are delivered through Google Play store Account & are automatically renewed. You can manage your subscription from your app settings whenever. In case you cancel your subscription, your current active subscription will continue until expired & won’t be renewed after.

SUPPORT
Our support team is happy to help: support@golfgamebook.com

TERMS OF USE
https://golfgamebook.com/terms-of-use/

PRIVACY POLICY
https://golfgamebook.com/privacy-policy/

title:
Golf GameBook Scorecard & GPS
11.5.2

creator: GameBook Oy
descriptionHtml:
Take your golf game to the next level!

Golf GameBook combines a golf GPS, a digital scorecard, and a golf rangefinder into one easy-to-use app, making it a must-have tool for all golf players.

Key Features:

• Digital Scorecard & Real-Time Leaderboards: Quickly create rounds, track scores, and see who's leading, all within the app with a user friendly golf scorecard.

• Accurate Golf GPS & RangeFinder: Access GPS maps on over 45,000 courses worldwide and get precise shot distances. The rangefinder tells the distance to the flag so you can plan your approach shots better.

• Versatile Game Formats: Choose from 20 different formats including skins, scramble, and match play, and participate in challenges with global leaderboards.

• Multi-group tournaments: Create your own tournaments & events with live golf scorecard and leaderboard for multiple groups and players.

• Advanced stats: Collect advanced stats such as bunker shots, GIRs, chip shots, up & downs, first putt distances, fairway hits & where you missed the greens. With our accurate golf GPS and rangefinder you’ll get hole-specific stats. You can easily fill in the stats in the digital golf scorecard.

Apple Watch integration: Use the golf GPS, golf rangefinder and golf scorecard on your watch if you prefer. The integration with the app is quick and easy.

Golf GameBook includes both a free version and a subscription version with premium features.

Join the Community: Add friends, share scores, and compete in fun contests like longest drive and closest to pin. Measure your drive with the GPS, share it with friends and wait for their comments. Follow your friends live on the course and stay engaged.

Support: Our team is ready to assist at support@golfgamebook.com. For more details on our terms and privacy policy, visit:

• https://golfgamebook.com/terms-of-use/
• https://golfgamebook.com/privacy-policy/

Download Golf GameBook now - having a golf GPS, a rangefinder and a golf scorecard in your pocket will truly enhance your whole golfing experience!

title:
Golf GameBook Scorecard & GPS
11.6.0

creator: GameBook Oy
descriptionHtml:
Golf scorecard, golf gps, golf rangefinder – and everything else you need from a golf app.

Golf GameBook makes golf more fun, and scoring more social. Store all your rounds and memories in one place – and share everything with friends. Get live leaderboards for all your games from regular Sunday Skins to your own Ryder Cup style tournaments. Golf GameBook is a clubhouse in your pocket: join a golf community of over 1,5 million golfers with over 35 million rounds played.

EASY-TO-USE GOLF SCORECARD
Keep scores on your golf rounds easily, for yourself or the entire group. Golf GameBook makes sure you have the correct playing handicap for every golf course according to WHS rules and helps you with all the math – no matter the game format. Play 20 different game formats including skins, match play and a number of team game formats like scramble and better ball. You can also add fun contests, like Closest to the Pin, to your round.

GOLF ACTION ON LIVE LEADERBOARDS
Every golfer deserves their own crowd. Get real-time updates on scores and rankings from your golf friends. Live leaderboards place you in the middle of the action, whether you’re on the course or in the comfort of your couch. Measure your long drives with our golf GPS and share it to your friends with ease.

GOLF TOURNAMENTS – ALSO IN RYDER CUP STYLE
Get ready to take your golf tournaments to the next level! Create advanced single or multi-round golf tournaments for even the largest group of golf buddies. You can also drive into the thrill of Team Match Play in Ryder Cup style by dividing players into two teams: Reds and Blues. Watch as the scores accumulate, building up the excitement towards the end.

TRACK YOUR GOLFING PROGRESS
See your golf game improvement over different time periods & set goals for yourself. Track details about your game by collecting golf statistics. Are you curious about your scoring average or how many birdies, pars or bogeys you’ve made? Or looking to dig deeper into your long or short game numbers? We got you covered. With our accurate golf GPS and rangefinder you’ll get hole-specific stats. You can easily fill in the stats in the digital golf scorecard.

COURSE MAPS, GOLF GPS & RANGEFINDER
Plan and measure your golf shots on over 42,000 courses across 200 countries using our GPS maps & golf rangefinder. Get accurate distances with the rangefinder to any spot on the course and play smarter. Hit a perfect drive? Measure your shot with the GPS and share the result with your friends.

GOLF GAMEBOOK APP FEATURES
Easy-to-use golf scorecard
Correct playing handicap for every course according to WHS rules
20 exciting individual, pair and team game formats
Advanced single or multi-round tournaments for up to 72 players
“Reds vs Blues” team match play tournaments in Ryder Cup style
“Friends on course” shows you quickly who’s golfing
Golf GPS & Golf Rangefinder for over 42,000 courses
Share moments from your rounds to game feed
Show some love for your friends’ games by liking and commenting on their golf scorecard
Take part in fun challenges to win prizes from top brands
Golf statistics to keep track of your fairway and green hits, putts, chips, and much more
Set a goal, hit the targets, and achieve your desired handicap

GET MORE WITH GOLD MEMBERSHIP
Golf GameBook includes both a free version and a subscription version with premium features. Upgrade to Gold Membership to unlock all the features you’ll ever need. Try it out carefree with a 14-day free trial!

Golf GameBook offers two Gold Membership subscription options with varying durations (1 month and 1 year) & prices. Both options give you full access to Gold Membership features.

SUPPORT
Suggestions, issues with the app or a missing course? Our support team is happy to help you at support@golfgamebook.com

Terms of use: https://golfgamebook.com/terms-of-use/
Privacy policy: https://golfgamebook.com/privacy-policy/
